name: Linear Algebra
title: Study of linear equations, matrices, vector spaces, and linear transformations, forming the foundation for many areas of mathematics and its applications

name: Probability Theory
title: Mathematical study of random phenomena, probability distributions, and stochastic processes essential for statistics and machine learning

name: Information Theory
title: Mathematical study of quantification, storage, and communication of information, including entropy, data compression, and channel capacity

name: Numerical Optimization
title: Study of algorithms and methods for finding minimum or maximum values of mathematical functions, crucial for machine learning and engineering

name: Machine Learning Foundations
title: Fundamental concepts of machine learning including supervised/unsupervised learning, model evaluation, and basic algorithms

name: Representation Learning
title: Study of learning data representations that make it easier to extract useful information for machine learning tasks

name: Deep Learning
title: Neural network architectures, training techniques, and applications in various domains like computer vision and natural language processing

name: Deep RL
title: Integration of deep learning with reinforcement learning for training agents through neural networks in complex environments

name: Large Language Models
title: Architecture, training, and application of large-scale transformer models for natural language processing tasks

name: Statistics
title: Collection, analysis, interpretation, and presentation of data, including hypothesis testing and statistical inference

name: Calculus
title: Study of continuous change, including derivatives, integrals, and infinite series, fundamental to mathematical modeling

name: Graph Theory
title: Mathematical study of graphs and networks, including connectivity, paths, and structural properties

name: Convex Optimization
title: Study of minimizing convex functions over convex sets, with applications in machine learning and operations research

name: Non‑Convex Optimization
title: Advanced optimization techniques for non-convex problems, including gradient-based methods and global optimization

name: Complexity Theory
title: Study of computational resource requirements and limitations of algorithms and problems

name: Number Theory
title: Study of integers and their properties, fundamental to cryptography and computer science

name: Abstract Algebra
title: Study of algebraic structures like groups, rings, and fields, with applications in cryptography and coding theory

name: Data Structures & Algorithms
title: Fundamental computer science concepts covering data organization and algorithm design for efficient problem solving

name: Mapping and SLAM
title: Mapping and simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM) for robots and autonomous systems

name: Multi-modality Learning
title: Teaching models to learn images, videos, audio, along with text

name: Autonomous Driving
title: Study, explore, and implement autonomous driving and robotics systems

name: Manipulation and Humannoid Robotics
title: Study, explore, and implement manipulation and humannoid robotics systems

name: Unsupervised Learning
title: Machine learning techniques for finding patterns and structure in unlabeled data

name: Self‑Supervised Learning
title: Training paradigm where supervision comes from the data itself rather than explicit labels

name: Symbolic AI
title: Symbolic AI is an approach to artificial intelligence that represents knowledge explicitly using symbols and logical rules to perform reasoning and problem solving.

name: Model Compression & Acceleration
title: Methods for reducing model size and improving inference speed while maintaining performance

name: Game Theory
title: Mathematical study of strategic decision making and interactions between rational agents

name: Approximation Algorithms
title: Algorithms that find approximate solutions to optimization problems that are hard to solve exactly

name: Differential Geometry
title: Study of smooth manifolds and their geometric properties, including curvature and geodesics

name: Partial Differential Equation
title: Study of partial derivatives of functions of multiple variables, with applications in physics and engineering

name: Generative Models
title: (VAE/GAN/Diffusion) Deep learning models capable of generating new data samples similar to training data

name: Learning-based Computer Graphics
title: Learning-based techniques in computer graphics for creating realistic and interactive 3D environments

name: Graph Neural Networks
title: Neural networks that operate on graph-structured data for tasks like node classification and link prediction

name: Causal Inference for ML
title: Methods for understanding and leveraging cause-effect relationships in machine learning

name: Off2Online RL
title: Reinforcement learning techniques that work with previously collected data without environment interaction

name: Multi‑Agent RL
title: Reinforcement learning in systems with multiple interacting agents

name: Meta‑Learning
title: Training models that can quickly adapt to new tasks with minimal data

name: Continual Learning
title: Methods for training models that can learn continuously from a stream of data without forgetting

name: Retrieval‑Augmented Generation
title: Enhancing language model outputs by incorporating information from external knowledge sources

name: Alignment & RLHF
title: Techniques for aligning language models with human values and preferences

name: AutoML
title: Automated methods for selecting and optimizing machine learning models and pipelines

name: Explainable AI
title: Methods for understanding and interpreting decisions made by machine learning models

name: Responsible AI & Fairness
title: Principles and techniques for developing AI systems that are ethical, fair, and transparent

name: Digital Signal Processing
title: Techniques for analyzing, filtering, and reconstructing signals in time and frequency domains.

name: C++ Programming
title: Introduction to C++ programming, object-oriented programming, and memory management. Covers tree, graph, linked list, and etc.

name: Python Programming
title: Introduction to Python programming, scientific computing, and data analysis.

name: Web Development & Databases
title: Introduction to web development and databases, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SQL.

name: Computer Systems
title: Introduction to computer systems, including architecture, operating systems, and computer networks.

name: Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies
title: Introduction to blockchain technology, blockchain platforms, including consensus mechanisms, smart contracts, and decentralized applications.

name: Chips and VLSI Design
title: Introduction to chips and VLSI design, including digital logic, computer architecture, and computer organization.

name: Classical Mechanics
title: Newtonian, Lagrangian, and Hamiltonian mechanics describing fundamental motion laws

name: Electromagnetism
title: Study of electric/magnetic fields and their interactions via Maxwell's equations

name: Vibrations and Waves
title: Mathematical analysis of mechanical/electromagnetic waves and quantum oscillations

name: Quantum Mechanics
title: Quantized behavior of microscopic particles including Schrödinger equation

name: Statistical Physics
title: Deriving macroscopic thermodynamics from microscopic particle statistics

name: Solid State Physics
title: Crystal structures, band theory, and semiconductor properties

name: Quantum Computing
title: Theoretical foundations and algorithms using quantum bits (qubits)

name: Special Relativity
title: Einstein's theory of spacetime for high-velocity objects

name: Astrophysics
title: Physical laws applied to celestial objects and cosmic evolution

name: Quantum Field Theory
title: Quantum description of fields and particles combining QM and relativity

name: General Relativity
title: Einstein's theory of gravity as curvature of spacetime
